overview:
Bruce Thompson was raised in North Central Montana where hard work and family values are instilled early in life. At 10 years old, he started selling milk from the family farm to local school bus drivers for $1 per gallon, and while attending MSU-Northern on a wrestling scholarship, Bruce studied marketing and business management. A few years later, after serving his time in the Military, Bruce found himself in S. Florida starting another business. This one rapidly grew into the largest motorized pool cover company in the SE. In 2004, craving for more time with his family and less travel, Bruce relinquished reigns to this thriving company with offices in 5 different states.
